TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEditableCollectionViewAddNewItem implements class System.ComponentModel.IEditableCollectionView

summary.span: 定義 實作的方法和屬性，以指定加入特定型別的項目。

span.span: Defines methods and properties that a implements to enable specifying adding items of a specific type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓應用程式開發人員可以指定要加入至集合的物件型別。The interface enables application developers to specify what type of object to add to a collection. 這個介面延伸，所以您可以新增、 編輯和移除集合中的項目。This interface extends , so you can add, edit, and remove items in a collection. 新增方法，這個方法會接受物件加入至集合。 adds the method, which takes an object that is added to the collection. 當您想要加入的物件與集合擁有一或多個下列特性時，這個方法很有用：This method is useful when the collection and objects that you want to add have one or more of the following characteristics: - 中的物件是不同的型別。The objects in the are different types. - 物件沒有預設建構函式。The objects do not have a default constructor. - 物件已存在。The object already exists. - 您想要新增`null`物件加入至集合。You want to add a `null` object to the collection. ## Examples 下列範例可讓使用者將各種類型的項目加入至集合。The following example enables a user to add various types of items to a collection. 使用者可以輸入新的項目和送出項目，或取消交易。The user can enter a new item and submit the entry or cancel the transaction. 此範例會取得從屬性和建立的物件時，其型別由使用者。The example gets an from the property of a and creates an object, whose type is determined by the user. 接著，範例會呼叫方法將物件加入至集合。Then the example calls the method to add the object to the collection. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#mainwindowlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mainwindowlogic)] 下列範例會建立使用者介面，如先前的範例。The following example creates the user interface for the previous example. [!code-xaml[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml#mainwindowxaml)] 下列範例會建立`AddItemWindow`使用者將加入新項目的資料。The following example creates the `AddItemWindow` in which the user adds data for a new item. [!code-xaml[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemXaml](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/additem.xaml#additemxaml)] 下列範例顯示的邏輯`AddItemWindow`。The following example shows the logic for the `AddItemWindow`. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/additem.xaml.cs#additemlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#AddItemLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/additemwindow.xaml.vb#additemlogic)] 下列範例顯示前述範例中的資料型別和集合，可用。The following example shows the data types and collection that is used in the previous examples. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#Data](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/data.cs#data)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#Data](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/data.vb#data)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNewItem(object newItem) cil managed
Public Function AddNewItem (newItem As Object) As Object

span.span: The object to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將指定的物件加入至集合。

span.span: Adds the specified object to the collection.
The object that is added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫方法，它一開始會加入異動。When you calling the method, it begins an add transaction. 您應該呼叫或結束加入異動的方法。You should call the or methods to end the add transaction. 新的項目一律會顯示集合檢視中。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何篩選、 排序或群組也就套用至檢視套用至新項目時呼叫。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，將物件加入至集合。The following example calls the method to add an object to a collection. 完整的範例，請參閱類別。For the complete example, see the class. [!code-csharp[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/csharp/window1.xaml.cs#mainwindowlogic)] [!code-vb[IEditableCollectionViewAddItemExample#MainWindowLogic](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ieditablecollectionviewadditemexample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mainwindowlogic)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNewItem As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNewItem { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示指定的物件是否可以加入至此集合。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a specified object can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果指定的物件可以加入至集合則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a specified object can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`true`，您可以指定要藉由呼叫加入至集合的物件方法。If the property is `true`, you can specify an object to add to the collection by calling the method. 是`false`如果項目無法加入集合使用。 is `false` if items cannot be added to the collection by using . 如果是`false`，您仍然可以將物件加入使用方法。If is `false`, you may still be able to add an object by using the method. 比方說，您可以將物件加入至 ADO.NET 來源使用，但不是使用。For example, you can add objects to an ADO.NET source by using , but not by using .
